DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date on which the diagnostic, therapeutic, and/or research equipment was approved by the sponsor as having met qualifications for study participation.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Diagnostic, Therapeutic, and Research Equipment Qualification
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An object needed to perform a diagnostic, therapeutic or research activity._The action of verifying that a person, process, product or piece of equipment is suitable for a particular postition or task.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An object needed to perform a diagnostic, therapeutic or research activity.

Concepts.definition: A manufactured object that is used to perform diagnostic, therapeutic or research activities.

Property.preferredDefinition: A quality, ability, or accomplishment that makes a person suitable for a particular position or task.

Concepts.definition: The action of verifying that a person, process, product or piece of equipment is suitable for a particular postition or task.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

DataElementConcept.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 10/7/13  released; reused in Round 4 CDE.  9/26/12 Curated for Core Lab QA.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The place in time that any record of a medical imaging event whether physical or electronic  happens.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Time meaning: Like time, date, frequency, occurence,..etc

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Any record of a medical imaging event whether physical or electronic.:Event; something that happens at a given place and time.:a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: Any record of a medical imaging event whether physical or electronic.
Something that happens at a given place and time.
The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network
ValueDomain.changeDescription: 11/30/10 removed "Manually_curated" from definition.  7/16/08 - updated to include qualifers used in long name.  released for use in UofWash study.  3/16/07 - created to support the 10 character ACRIN date fields which include the '/'.

ReferenceDocuments.name: ACRIN Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: If scanner has been qualified, provide date.

DataElement.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network
DataElement.changeDescription: 10/9/13 added PET Equipment CSI. jc   10/8/13 Created/released per post Rnd 4 community comments; supercedes CDE 2717711v1.0 - generalized from PET to Equipment. Current CS/CSIs attached to new CDE. jc  12/2/10 added to PET QA Assessment CRF CSI.  11/30/10 Removed ACRIN as OC qualifier to promote reuse; used in PET QC CRF module.  10/14/10 released as part of draft CDE cleanup activity.  12/31/07 Created to support curation of ACRIN PET CDEs
